name: Nike Air Force 1
description: The Nike Air Force 1 is a classic basketball shoe that has been around since 1982. It is a low-top shoe with a leather upper and a rubber sole. The shoe is available in a variety of colors and styles.

name: Nike Tech Fleece Joggers
description: The Nike Tech Fleece Joggers are a pair of joggers that are made from a soft, warm fleece fabric. They have a tapered fit and a drawstring waistband.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: The Nike Air Max 270 is a running shoe that was released in 2018. It is a low-top shoe with a mesh upper and a rubber sole. The shoe is available in a variety of colors and styles.

name: Banana
description: A banana is an edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

name: Roast Beef
description: Roast beef is a dish of beef that has been roasted in an oven. It is usually served with Yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes, and vegetables.

name: Andrex Classic Clean Toilet Tissue
description: Andrex Classic Clean Toilet Tissue is a soft, strong and absorbent toilet tissue. It is made from 100% recycled fibre and is FSC certified.
